# Copilot Project Memory

This file provides GitHub Copilot with context and guidance for this project.

## Project Description

_Describe the purpose and goals of your project here._

## Coding Style & Conventions

- Use clear, descriptive variable and function names.
- Follow PEP8 for Python code.
- Add docstrings to all public functions and classes.

## Key Dependencies

- Python 3.x
- List any major libraries or frameworks here (e.g., FastAPI, PyTorch, etc.)

## File/Folder Structure

- `src/` - Main source code
- `tests/` - Unit and integration tests
- `README.md` - Project overview

## Special Instructions for Copilot

- Prefer async functions where possible.
- Use type hints in Python code.
- Add comments for complex logic.
